#Swagger spec for the EXAMPLE REST API ## HTTP://localhost:8080/exampleWebAPI/example This is Proof-of-concept using Swagger-UI, Swagger-Core, and the Swagger Maven Plugin **Version** Version 1.0.0 [**Terms of Service**]() # APIs ## /user ### GET <a id="getUser">Get list of users</a> #### Request ##### Parameters #### Response **Content-Type: ** application/json | Status Code | Reason | Response Model | |-------------|-------------|----------------| | 404 | {error: Not Found} | - | ### POST <a id="createUser">Creates a new and user</a> #### Request ##### Parameters <table border="1"> <tr> <th>Name</th> <th>Located in</th> <th>Required</th> <th>Description</th> <th>Default</th> <th>Schema</th> </tr> <tr> <th>body</th> <td>body</td> <td>yes</td> <td>user object</td> <td> - </td> <td> <a href="#/definitions/UserModel">UserModel</a> </td> </tr> </table> #### Response **Content-Type: ** application/json | Status Code | Reason | Response Model | |-------------|-------------|----------------| | 404 | {error: Not Found} | - | ## /user/{id} ### GET <a id="getUser">Gets and individual user based off the ID</a> #### Request ##### Parameters <table border="1"> <tr> <th>Name</th> <th>Located in</th> <th>Required</th> <th>Description</th> <th>Default</th> <th>Schema</th> </tr> <tr> <th>id</th> <td>path</td> <td>yes</td> <td>id</td> <td> - </td> <td>integer (int32)</td> </tr> </table> #### Response **Content-Type: ** application/json | Status Code | Reason | Response Model | |-------------|-------------|----------------| | 404 | {error: Not Found} | - | # Definitions ## <a name="/definitions/UserModel">UserModel</a> <table border="1"> <tr> <th>name</th> <th>type</th> <th>required</th> <th>description</th> <th>example</th> </tr> <tr> <td>id</td> <td> integer (int64) </td> <td>optional</td> <td>-</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>username</td> <td> string </td> <td>optional</td> <td>-</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>firstName</td> <td> string </td> <td>optional</td> <td>-</td> <td></td> </tr> <tr> <td>lastName</td> <td> string </td> <td>optional</td> <td>-</td> <td></td> </tr> </table>
